follow_up_questions: What is the highest temperature recorded?
How was the temperature measured (oral, rectal, forehead)?
When did the fever start?
How often does it come and go?
Has any medication been given for the fever?
Are there any other symptoms like rash, cough, vomiting?
Has the child been exposed to anyone sick recently?
red_flags_to_trigger: Fever with stiff neck or seizures

follow_up_questions: When did the vomiting start?
How many times has the child vomited?
Is the vomit forceful or projectile?
Is there blood or green (bilious) fluid in the vomit?
Is the child able to keep fluids down?
Any recent food intake or travel?
Any signs of dehydration (dry mouth, no urine)?
When did the rash first appear?
Where on the body is the rash located?
Is the rash itchy or painful?
Has the child had a fever?
Has the child started any new medications, soaps, or foods?
Has the rash spread or changed in appearance?
Are there blisters or open sores?
red_flags_to_trigger: Rash with breathing difficulty or swelling
